name: Space Inhalers
description:
Controls: 
WASD - Move 
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot 
ESC - Exit 

Protect your base from the space invaders using a veeEEeeeeeeery unconventional weapon…

Pick up passengers and throw them right into aliens’ faces!

Don’t tell anything to people! Sacrifices must be made…

Don’t forget to take care of your respect among the planet’s population.
